channel.title: Guns of Hollywood
channel.description: We talk about guns in films and tv, from your favorite western to that run and gun action film.
channel.itunes:summary: Guns Of Hollywood talks about just that, guns in films and tv. From your favorite western to that run and gun action film you can't stop watching, we look at all the guns that make them go "bang". We strive to bring to the show a diverse knowledge base, variety of interests and special guests as we examine both the firearms and films that we all love so much.
channel.itunes:author: Firearms Radio Network

item.title: Guns of Hollywood 055 – National Treasure
item.dc:creator: allie
item.description: Guns of Hollywood talks about the guns and action in National Treasure (2004). A Disney film with only one dead body, and he isn’t even shot! Has GOH gone pacifist? Nah, it was fun watching Nicolas Cage steal the Declaration of Independence, but we promise more mayhem in the future.

item.title: Guns of Hollywood 050 – Year in review and awards show
item.dc:creator: allie
item.description: Guns of Hollywood looks back at our first fifty episodes. What was the best, the worst and stupid? Special thanks to Gene Carangal who suggested doing a review show and who we forgot to mention when we were talking about the guest hosts we’ve had on. We haven’t forgotten you Gene – we’re just stupid.

channel.media:description: Guns Of Hollywood talks about just that, guns in films and tv. From your favorite western to that run and gun action film you can't stop watching, we look at all the guns that make them go "bang". We strive to bring to the show a diverse knowledge base, v
